siyalu jathinta wiruddhawa dewi thama balaya penwanne elesayi. 27 swargaye senawala adhipathi wana yehowa dewi aramunu kala de+ nishpala kala hakke katada?+ ohuge balawath hasthayata wiruddhawa nangi sitiya hakke katada?+ 28 me thinduwa prakasha karana ladde aahas raju miya giya+ awuruddediya. 29 “pilisthiwaruni,+ obata pahara dun thanaththage sarayatiya bindunu nisa+ prithi nowanna.+ manda ee sarpaya wethin+ wisha sarpayek nikmenneya.+ ee sarpaya polangeku men pana pana pahara denu atha.+ 30 namuth yatahathpahath janayage kulundulanda duppathunda hondin ka bi kisi biyak sakak nathuwa suwa se wasaya karanu atha.+ eheth obe daruwanta sidu wanne saginnen marennayi.

mosesge kalaye di da athishuddhasthanaya thejanwitha wa kapa wana lesa salamon raju yachnya kala witath walakulu darshanaya wunak men walakula da penenu atha”yi kiwe ya. 9 thawada salamon raju thama pragnya mahimayen shuddhasthanaye wada hamara kota eya kapa kirimata puda pujawa oppu kala sati da ehi warthagatha kara thibuni. 10 moses samindanan wahanseta yachnya kala wita ahasin ginna basa awuth puda pujawa dawwa se ma salamon raju yachnya kala witath, ihalin pamini ginna dawana yaga puja dawadamme ya. 11 papa puja pandura dawi giye eya anubhawa nokala heyin ya yi moses wisin kiyana ladi. 12 salamon raja da piliwelata ma ata dawasak mangalya pawath wiya.

(sunil daya alwis)antharjathika abhiyoga hamuwe wuwada karmika anshaya 2011 wasare siyayata 10.3 ka wardhanayak labagena thibe.ema wardhanaya athpath kara gena aththe karmantha shala nishpadana yana anshawalini.idikirim anshaya da pasugiya warshayedi labagena athi wardhanaya siyayata 14.2 ki.me hara krushikarmaya, dhiwara, thoga ha sillara welendama, prawahana ha sanniwedana, banku, rakshana ha depala welendama yana anshawalin ikuth wasaredi siyayata 8.6 ka wardhanayak labagena atha.shri lanka maha bankuwe 2011 wasara sandaha wana warshika warthawen ema karunu sandahan kara thibena athara eki warthawa mudal amathyawaraya wana mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithuma wetha ikuth 9 wanida maha banku parishraye pawathi uthsawayakadi piliganwiya.maha bankuwe adhipathi ajith niwad kabral mahatha wisin me banku warthawa janadhipathithumata piliganwima sidu karini.meya maha bankuwe 62 wani warshika warthawayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
